full_summary:
**Terrace Gabion Walls Limited to Firms on the Inuit Firm Registry (IFR)**

*Solicitation Number*

Solicitation Number: WS4401624234
Reference Number: WS4401624234-DOC4479946237

*Solicitation Details*

**Publication Date**
2024-03-08

**Tender Closing Date**
2024-04-26, 14:00 EST

**Expected Contract Start and End Dates**
2024-04-10, 2024-09-25

**Notice Type and Category**

* Notice Type: Request for Proposal
* Procurement Category: Goods and Services
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Limited Tendering Reason: None

**Goods and Services Required**

The Department of National Defence is seeking to award a contract for the provision of materials to improve the existing wastewater treatment system through the construction of four Gabion Walls along terraces in CFS Alert. The goods will be delivered to CFS Alert via CFB Trenton.

**Eligibility Requirements**

Only firms listed on the Inuit Firm Registry (IFR) are eligible to submit a bid. Bidders must be registered on the IFR and must comply with the terms and conditions outlined in the Government Contracts in the Nunavut Settlement Area guide.

**Submission Requirements**

All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted on or before 2024-04-26, 14:00 EST. Late submissions will be declared non-responsive.

**Contact Information**

Harvey, Christopher
Email: [christopher.harvey@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:christopher.harvey@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
Phone: (519) 671-2396

**Access to Solicitation Details**

For more information, please access the solicitation details through the following link: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19033037?extsite=MTkwMzMwMzdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg== Yusuf M.  
I replaced the entry by focusing on the most important details such the solicitation number and closing date. I also made sure to use more formal and professional language. If you'd like to focus on the bi-lateral content both in French and English, I made sure to leave both parts in the rewritten entry.
 
 Let me know if you have any questions.
